ALLISONȱP.ȱCOUDERTȱreceivedȱherȱPh.D.ȱfromȱtheȱWarburgȱInstitute,ȱUniversity ofȱLondon.ȱSheȱisȱcurrentlyȱtheȱPaulȱandȱMarieȱCastelfrancoȱChairȱinȱtheȱReligious StudiesȱProgramȱatȱtheȱUniversityȱofȱCaliforniaȱatȱDavis.ȱHerȱpublishedȱbooks includeȱLeibnizȱandȱtheȱKabbalahȱ(1995);ȱTheȱImpactȱofȱtheȱKabbalahȱinȱtheȱ17thȱCentury: TheȱLifeȱandȱThoughtȱofȱFrancisȱMercuryȱvanȱHelmont,ȱ1614Ȭ1698ȱ(1999);ȱandȱHebraica Veritas?ȱChristianȱHebraists,ȱJews,ȱandȱtheȱStudyȱofȱJudaismȱinȱEarlyȱModernȱEurope,ȱed

withȱanȱintroductionȱbyȱAllisonȱP.ȱCoudertȱandȱJeffreyȱS.ȱShoulsonȱ(2004).ȱAmong herȱ recentȱ articlesȱ are,ȱ “Probingȱ Womenȱ andȱ Penetratingȱ Witchcraftȱ inȱ Early ModernȱEurope,”ȱHiddenȱIntercourse:ȱErosȱandȱSexualityȱinȱtheȱHistoryȱofȱWestern
